data.name: FOR HONOR™ - Battle Pass - Year 6 Season 2
data.detailed_description:
What horror has been unleashed on Heathmoor? Discover the secrets of the Scarab Bracelet with the Y6S2 Battle Pass that gives you access to 100 tiers of rewards.

This Battle Pass includes the following rewards for all 30 heroes:

- One execution (per hero).
- One weapon set (per hero).
- One podium (per hero).
- Two battle outfits (per hero).
- Two effects (idle/emote/execution) (per hero).
- Various customization elements.
- A 10% bonus in battle points earned through completed matches.
- And more!

The For Honor® Y6S2 Battle Pass offer does not add any new benefits to the game if you already own the Y6S2 Battle Bundle.

This Y6S2 Battle Pass is available until September 13, 2022, and is not eligible for refund.

data.short_description: The Y6S2 Battle Pass has arrived. Get 100 tiers of rewards for all heroes! Available during Y6S2 only.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 | AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 / GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM | AMD Radeon R9 270 / R9 370 / RX460 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 with 3 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon RX580 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
